channel.title: Pretty easy q, but i'm a nube in coding so plz help
channel.description: how do i change what it says first when u log in? like when someone does ::help or ::rules i want to add thes,e and add whatever i want it to say. someon plz help me thank youo, i'm using a phonescape source.

item.title: Pretty easy q, but i'm a nube in coding so plz help
item.dc:creator: @i_am_an_elf i am an elf
item.description:
@i_am_an_elf wrote:

yes it is in a note pad called client.

username… do u know what your talking about its a notepad… called client or in some cases client.java.

to search just press "ctrl and f and the same time if u ddint know that. if u need anything else just ask me im always happy to help out new people

Read full topic

item.title: Pretty easy q, but i'm a nube in coding so plz help
item.dc:creator: @xxbestxx xxbestxx
item.description:
@xxbestxx wrote:

Username:

in client.java btw im the guy who tipped you about kind46 this morning and hes still going at it…

i’m very sorry and i swear i didnt tell him to do that and thx.

[quote=“i am an elf, post:5, topic:114635”]open up client.java and search for that it says.

mine says this so i would open up cleint.java type in ctr f and search for Welcome to----- then edit that to whatever i want it to be.

“welcome to -------”
“hope you enjoy your stay”
“other stuff…”[/quote]

it’s in a notepad that’s titeled client?
